uvi.description:
watchdog: sc520_wdt: Fix possible use-after-free in wdt_turnoff()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.276 by commit b4565a8a2d6bffb05bfbec11399d261ec16fe373. For more details please see the references link.
